data.title: Still time to get tickets for launch of Thom Belk Community Fund
data.meta_description: NEXT weekend sees the launch of the Thom Belk Community Fund.
data.text:
It will be launched with a special musical event at Salisbury Arts Centre on Saturday, August 10, from 6pm-11pm

This music extravaganza features seven of Thom’s favourite Salisbury acts performing across two stages.

The Thom Belk Community Fund is a grant awarding body set up in Thom’s memory to offer financial, material and health and well being help to young people interested in music, performing arts and sport.

See also: Popular Organ Prom returns to Salisbury Cathedral this August

Acts and times:

10pm - 10.45pm Carsick

9.45pm -10pm Fund presentation/address

9pm -9.45pm Signature Vision

8.30pm - 9pm Lump

8pm - 8.30pm Charmtype

7.30pm - 8pm The Helmets

7pm - 7.30pm CLS

6.30pm -7pm Alex Morgan-Wardrop

Thom’s Tipple, a celebratory ale brewed by the Rude Giant Brew Co will be available at the event at £4 a pint. Belko Burgers will also be on sale, with veggie and vegan options available

All proceeds from this event will go to the Thom Belk Community Fund

For tickets go to wiltshirecreative.co.uk/book/instance/414601.
